info.name: visergo
info.description: Laramin REST API is a basic API collection of viserlab's basic admin. This api built by **Laravel** framework. Authentication built by a package called **Sanctum**. There are 25 endpoints in this collection including deposit, withdraw, authentication and more.

exec: // Extract the access token from the response

request.description:
| Field | Type |
| --- | ----------- |
| username | required |
| password | required |

**If once login successful, lets go to dashboard using bearer token. All endpoints of user panel are verification protected. So if user is email unverified, mobile unverified, You need to verify these things first. After verification of these things we need to complete one more step. This is profile completion step if user not provided the data previously.**

response.name: Login Validation error

request.description:
## Request Data

| Field           | Validation |
| ----------------------- |---------------|
| email                | required     |
| mobile                | required, number |
| password                | required, if enabled strong password (mixedCase, number, symbols, uncompromised) |
| password_confirmation                | required |
| username                | required, alpha numeric |
| mobile_code                | required:like 880 |
| country_code                | required:like BD |
| country                | required |
| agree                | required: if admin enabled|


**If once registration become successful, lets go to dashboard using bearer token. All endpoints of user panel are verification protected. So if user is email unverified, mobile unverified, You need to verify these things first. After verification of these things we need to complete one more step. This is profile completion step.**

response.name: Validation Error

request.description: # Logout the User by using this url

## Tables

| Field            | Validation |
| ----------------------- |:-------------:|
| Value                | required     |


**Once pass this step, lets go for verify email. Show a page to put the verification code, which a user has got via mail**

response.name: User not found

request.description:
## Tables

| Field            | Validation |
| ----------------------- |-------------|
| code                | required     |
| email                | required     |


**Once pass this step lets go for change the password. Show a page to enter password. Don't forget about secure password. If admin enable secure password, we must have to show user**

response.name: Validation Error

request.description:
## Request

| Field            | Validation |
| ----------------------- |-------------|
| token (The verification code)                | required     |
| email                | required     |
| password                | required, if enabled strong password (mixedCase, number, symbols, uncompromised)     |
| password_confirmation                | required     |

response.name: Validation Error

request.description: **In this endpoint you just need to send a request to get the verification in user's email or mobil. If user's ev=>Email Verification is 0 navigate user to email verification page else if mv=>Mobil Vetification is 0 navigate user to mobile verification page else if tv=>2FA verification is 0 navigate user to 2FA verification page else navigate user to dashboard**

| code      | Required     |

item.description: **KYC - Know Your Client option will applied for those users, who has not verified his/her KYC yet. If someone is KYC unverified, they couldn't make any withdraw request or they couldn't out his/her money from this account. KYC verified's short form of this system is >>kv**
